body: Novis identifies "the fools" in the political crisis in Cote d'Ivoire:"The basic fact is that Ouattara's claim of victory is no less disputable as that of Gbagbo. on the other hand, Gbagbo's claim of electoral fraud by his opponent is no more credible than that of Ouattara. So there's clear dispute!!! 'simple, tie-tia, short'. Where then lies the sense in claiming Ouattara won?"
original_body: Novis identifies "the fools" in the political crisis in Cote d'Ivoire:"The basic fact is that Ouattara's claim of victory is no less disputable as that of Gbagbo. on the other hand, Gbagbo's claim of electoral fraud by his opponent is no more credible than that of Ouattara. So there's clear dispute!!! 'simple, tie-tia, short'. Where then lies the sense in claiming Ouattara won?"
title: Cote d'Ivoire: Who are the fools in Ivorian crisis?

sentence: Novis identifies "the fools" in the political crisis in Cote d'Ivoire:"The basic fact is that Ouattara's claim of victory is no less disputable as that of Gbagbo.
on the other hand, Gbagbo's claim of electoral fraud by his opponent is no more credible than that of Ouattara.
So there's clear dispute!!! 'simple, tie-tia, short'.
Where then lies the sense in claiming Ouattara won?"
